item.title: Families and Whānau Status Report
item.description: In 2017 I assisted Superu (The Familiies Commission) with their analysis and visualisation of data for the Families and Whānau Status Report. I developed charts that helped the analysts understand their data better, and then produced final charts for inclusion in the final published report.

item.title: Spirals
item.description: Spiral heatmaps are great for displaying periodic datasets, and you want to show a continuous series without visual breaks at certain points (for example at the end and beginning of the calendar year).

item.title: Sankey charts with circular links
item.description: I’ve been developing improvements to the D3 sankey library, so that it can handle circular links. Circular links are really common when analysing exceptions to business processes or how people navigate around websites and apps.
